Hi,

I have a client server application. The client connects with a remote =
server (3rd party) and sends/receives different kinds of messages.

For my =
Junit test cases I am implementing my own server which simulates the behavi=
or of the 3rd party server.

Whats the best approach to test this.

- Where=
 do I include the code that actually launches my local test server (should =
this part of Junit test package)
- For each message type (exchanged b/w cli=
ent and my test server) that I will be testing, do I kick start / shut down=
 the server (seperately for each test case)
